I'm a UX designer & Front-End engineer in Portland, Oregon.

About Kyle Simukka

UX DESIGNER & FRONT-END ENGINEER

By embodying a cross-functional developer and designer role, I build great user-centered web applications.
-

I contribute to projects from research/design to user interface/back-end development. This ensures the experience is consistent throughout and no experience gaps exist between the visual and functional interface. Currently at Janrain, I work with various teams to create better experiences for our Customers. My favorite phase of any project is finishing the design and then turning it into a fully working interface using the latest technology and techniques.
